channel.title: 3D Printed Air Core Inductor on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in 3D Printed Air Core Inductor on SUPER-Lab

item.title: 3-D-Printed Air-Core Inductors for High-Frequency Power Converters
item.description: This paper presents the design, modeling, and characterization of 3-D-printed air-core inductors for high-frequency power electronics circuits. The use of 3-D modeling techniques to make passive components extends the design flexibility and addresses some of the fabrication limitations of traditional processes. In this paper, we present several examples of air-core inductors realized using 3-D printing and casting/plating techniques to give an idea of the geometries that are possible to design. Toward this goal, we present a 70-W prototype 27.12-MHz resonant inverter that incorporates some of the 3-D-printed components developed for this paper.
